response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $1,500,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I am extending an exclusive offer to you to acquire this product at a special price of $1,350,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its full value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I look forward to discussing the details and understanding your thoughts on this proposal. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
